# Well, Hello!

Mangos Mobile Beverage Co is the ultimate beverage catering experience on
wheels. Established in 2017, we combine good cocktails, great customer service
and a memorable experience for you and your guest. We would love to be apart
of your next event, special day or occasion.



Check out our packages!

Home: Welcome

## Introducing...

Ms. Maretini - our 1972 mobile beverage trailer!

Ms. Maretini is a 1972 converted horse trailer, she is equipped with a
beverage cooler, sinks , electricity and plenty of storage.

​

Maretini will bring an added touch with her decorations, a photo opp and
memorable experience for your guest.

​

​

## Special Price $775  


Includes 5 Hours

2 Bartenders, Basic Garnishes & Mixers

Cups, Napkins, Straws

For bookings made now thru 3/1/23

Reserve your date!

## Mangos Mobile Beverage Co.

Since 2020, Mangos Mobile Beverage Co. has become the most renowned beverage
catering service in Northern Cincinnati. Rooted in creativity and famous for
flawless execution, Mangos Mobile Beverage Co presents unparalleled lemonades,
teas, and frozen drinks worthy of the most distinguished palates.



We cater events ranging from romantic and intimate to festive and fabulous.
Our calendar fills up quickly, so connect with us early in the planning
process to ensure availability.

​

Not only do we offer mobile bartending services , we offer soft drink
packages, shaved ice and more!

# What we offer...

To create an experience to remember, we offer customizable packages to choose
from, and the option for you to add on items to your bartending package. All
packages can be customized to your liking.

* Host provides the Liquor/ Beer / Wine /

​

* Dates are confirmed when deposit is paid, and contract signed. 30% of package due with signed contract. Remaining balance is 7 days prior to the event.

Have question? Not seeing what you're looking for? Send us an e-mail!

Get a Quote!

## Bartending Only

Bartending only which is for 4 hours.

Includes all basic bartending tools.

$195 Per Bartender
